feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: This is an add-on for the Qompass tool suite supporting model based tracing, in particular with LTTng
feature.license: This program is provided by the CEA LIST in the context of the projects VERDE, SIRSEC, RT-DESCRIBE and RT-SIMEX. It can be used free of charge until the end of the respective projects. Further use or exploitation requires a new agreement with the CEA
